mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommeal(recommealno, content, protine, carbs, fat, kcal, rdate, adminno) VALUES(recommeal_seq.nextval, #{content},#{protine},#{carbs}, #{fat},#{kcal},sysdate,#{adminno})
mapper.select: SELECT recommealno, content, protine,carbs, fat, kcal, rdate, adminno FROM recommeal ORDER BY recommealno ASC
